basic.blooming: Flowering period July-August, fruiting period September-October
basic.color: Flower color orange, dotted with purple black, fruit color purple black

maintenance.sunlight: Likes cool and wet places with adequate sunlight, may shade slightly
maintenance.pruning: Remove old, diseased and dead leaves timely, after flowering remove the upper part staring from 5 cm above soil surface, leaving 3-5 leaves
